Comment: I have had pets, and I always knew the difference between the tiny tiger who would eat us if we died before it and the human beings all related to each other.  Never once did anyone in my family see the cat on equal standing with the people.  But you go ahead and play the part of "cat person."  Just like Taylor Swift.
Author: thatrightwinger

Comment: Well I so much enjoy people who ASSUME things not in evidence.  I happen to have 3 dogs and only 1 cat between my wife and I.  They are family and apparently you don't care about your pets as much as me or most people I know who own them and consider them as important as human family.  Good day.
Author: ComputerRedneck

Comment: Two very different animals.  Cats are opportunists, and will eat you if you die.  Dogs are ever faithful, and will pine at your grave.  There are myriad of examples of dogs giving their lives for humans.  I'm unaware of a single case where a cat sacrificed itself for a human.  As one comedian quipped, when the vet says Fluffy's kidneys are failing, we say it's time to get another cat.  If the dog's kidneys are failing, Rex is on a  helicopter to Northwestern Hospital, with a new dog kidney being police-escorted through downtown Chicago at high speed.
Author: Carl-j88aa

Comment: The human race doesn't deserve doggos, but they stay by our side anyway. No amount of people can compare to man's goodest boy.
